entry.content:

C

 angkatlah ke atas dagumu yang

entry.title: Calum Scott - No Matter What
entry.content:
[Intro:] 
Gm  D# A#

[Verse I:]
Gm
When I was a young boy
D#                      A#
I was scared of growing up
   Gm
I didn't understand it but
D#                  A#
I was terrified of love 
      Gm
Felt like I had to choose
    D#                 A#
but it was outta my control
   Gm
I needed to be saved
      D#                A#
I was going crazy on my own

[Pre-Chorus:]
            Cm                A#
It took me years to tell my mother
    D#
I expected the worst
     Cm              A#
I gathered all the courage
       F
In the world..

[Chorus:]
                      Gm  D#
She said, "I love you no..
         A#
Matter what
       Gm              D#
I just want you to be happy
           A#
And always be who you are
      Gm               D#
She wrapped her arms around me said
              A#
"Don't try to be what you're not
F        Gm         D#      A#
Cause I love you no matter what..
F     Gm        D#     A#
She loves me no matter what..

[Verse II:]
  Gm
I got a little older
D#                    A#
wishing all my time away
  Gm
Riding on the pavement
D#                  A#
every sunny day was grey
    Gm
I trusted in my friends
     D#                          A#
then all my world came crashing down
          Gm
I wish I never said a thing cause
   D#                  A#
to them I'm a stranger now..

[Pre-Chorus:]
       Cm           A#
I ran home I saw my mother
        D#
it was written on my face
             D#             A#
Felt like I had a heart of glass about
    F
To break..

[Chorus:]
                      Gm  D#
She said, "I love you no..
         A#
Matter what
       Gm              D#
I just want you to be happy
           A#
and always be who you are
      Gm               D#
She wrapped her arms around me said
              A#
"Don't try to be what you're not
F        Gm         D#      A#
Cause I love you no matter what yeah.. 

[Bridge:]
D#                             A#
  Now I'm a man and I'm so much wiser
D#                                   A#
  I walk the earth with my head held higher
D#                       F
  I got the love that I need
            Gm          Dm           Cm
But I was still missing one special piece
   A#               D#
My father looked at me..

[Chorus:]
                      Gm  D#
She said, "I love you no..
         A#
Matter what
       Gm              D#
I just want you to be happy
           A#
and always be who you are
F       Gm               D#
 He wrapped his arms around me said
              A#
"Don't try to be what you're not
F        Gm         D#      A#
Cause I love you no matter what..
F     Gm       D#    A#
He loves me no matter what..

entry.title: James Arthur Feat Travis Barker - You
entry.content:
[Intro]
         Am
Fighting, living, dying
              Am
For what? For freedom 
That's what which men 
have fought since time began
To be free
 
[Verse I:]
Am
They've been making blanked statements
scaring everyone
Am
They've been making you feel like 
you never did belong
      F
Yeah, he said, and she said, yeah
they say a lot
F
So many things, they just think you forgot
Am
Who you are, and what you do, 
and where you're coming from
Am
I just thought I could remind you 
with a simple song
F
Look at body language, can start to rebuff
   F
To where we're using weapons, hatred
              G 
not love, not you..
 
[Chorus:]
               F        
You are in the wilderness 
                 Dm
looking for your own purpose
                 Am
And you became a butterfly, a butterfly
  G
I knew you always would
                   F
They were throwing sticks and stones
                Dm
Words can never break your bones
                    Am
You can spread your wings and fly, 
wings and fly
  G
I knew you always would
  F                 Dm
I knew.. you always would
  F                   Dm
I knew.. there always was 
nothing wrong with being
Am
(You, you, you, you, you, 
you, you, you)
 
[Verse II:]
Am
All you ever see on CNN are enemies
Am
Telling you to lose your individuality
      F
Look, do this and do that, 
'till you've lost your way
     F
Till you need to fight or a means of escape
Am
They want you to stare into your screen 
and see yourself
     Am
Blow smoke into your mirror 
till you imagine your own world
   F
So don't let them catch you 
with lies and deceit
     F                    
They can't take your soul 
                        G
or your desire for freedom..
 
[Chorus:]
               F    
You are in the wilderness, 
                 Dm
looking for your own purpose
                 Am
And you became a butterfly, a butterfly
  G
I knew you always would
                   F
They were throwing sticks and stones
                Dm
Words can never break your bones
                    Am
You can spread your wings and fly, 
wings and fly
  G
I knew.. you always would
  F                 Dm
I knew.. you always would
  F                   Dm
I knew.. there always was 
nothing wrong with being (yeah, yeah)
  
[Bridge Rapp:]
         Am
You said I wanna be
             F
I'm gonna be everything 
they said I couldn't be
Am                               
Everything that I said I would be 
       Am
when I picked up a pen and I started to speak
F
I hear the beat, My melody

F
I just pour all my heart into these sheets
F
I cannot just be a star in the streets
       F
Man, I knew what was different, 
I had that belief
F
Nowhere to live, nothing to eat
F
You were so hungry that you couldn't sleep
Dm
You couldn't breathe, I couldn't be

Dm
All of this shit was happ'nin' to me
F
I would do drugs, I was a thief
F
Still on the run from the karma police
Am                       
You were the mission that 
                       Am
was given to me by the powers to be
 
[Post-Bridge]
               F   
You are in the wilderness, 
                 Dm
looking for your own purpose
                 Am
And you became a butterfly, a butterfly
  G
I knew you always would
  
[End Chorus:]

                 Dm
looking for your own purpose
                 Am

  G
I knew you always would
                   F
They were throwing sticks and stones
                Dm

                    Am

wings and fly
  G
I knew.. you always would

  F                   Dm
I knew.. there always was nothing 
wrong with being
